## Welcome

This site is dedicated to empowering Fort Collins residents to take local action in protecting democratic institutions. While national politics can feel overwhelming, real change happens from the ground up.

**What you'll find here:**  
✅ Key issues and how they impact Colorado.  
✅ How state and local leaders influence democracy.  
✅ Actionable ways to get involved.
